original_title: Kenny Wayne Shepherd Band - Straight To You: Live
overview: You get to watch the band in its full glory as well as listen. In the last 10 years the multi-platinum selling Shepherd has gone from strength to strength, winning countless awards, releasing four studio albums and touring the world over several times - from Brazil to Europe, India to Canada and US to Australia and beyond.
title: Kenny Wayne Shepherd Band - Straight To You: Live
